problem_text_cn: 如图,在平行四边形ABCD中,AE⊥BC于E,AF⊥CD于F,∠ABC=75°,则∠EAF的度数为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in the parallelogram ABCD, AE ⊥ BC at E, AF ⊥ CD at F, ∠ABC = N_0, then the degree of ∠EAF is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵平行四边形ABCD中,∠ABC=75°,∴∠C=105°,又∵AE⊥BC于E,AF⊥CD于F,∴四边形AECF中,∠EAF=360°-180°-105°=75°,故选:D.
raw_comment: 本题主要考查了平行四边形的性质,解题时注意:平行四边形的邻角互补,四边形的内角和等于360°.
